reviews.review: The game itself is good. I love being able to decide whether I want to be a survivor or test my skill as a killer. Friendships can be made and tested. there's not much that I dislike about the game. I've been playing since it first released on playstation and have since bought it on PC and other consoles. I would recommend trying it out.

Excelente juego para jugar con tus amigos/as. Lastima la gente toxica que no quiere jugar y solo te hace enojar...

pd: Michael Myers te amo
It's all about survival.   The game is very challenging, testing your skills, reflexes, will to survive (if you're playing survivor of course), and teamwork.  You must give it a try!!
Tenho mais de 500h de game no xbox one e tenho autoridade para dizer que esse game vale a pena ser jogado (com amigo).
Honestly one of the best games ive played in a while
Jogo bem divertido, principalmente pra jogar com amigos, tem uns bugs mas da pra relevar um pouco, o jogo Ã© bom
i spend my days grinding for bloodpoints only for my labor to produce little fruit, and my sanity lower. 10/10 i hate it

El juego me encanta, no puedo dejarlo por nada en verdad y ahora que sacaran el nuevo DLC es un encanto, pero muchas veces los bugs o los falsos golpes no ayudan mucho a los survs, de killer casi no juego pero intentare practicar XD, pero si lo recomiendo muchisimo

Stupid maps random system.

The random of map system are very stupid, no good zone in my map.

Good and Fun to play with Survivor with Friends [SWF] (Solo Queues for me is PRETTY long). Fun to play with Killers lots of ways to play as Killer with a sh*t ton of perks (obviously Survivors too).

I just wish some events they had for the summer for an example (Magaritas Gens) and rewards were worth playing and grinding.
4 survivors pitting their wits against a sadistic killer, best played with friends, but great fun!

Dead by Daylight is my all time favorite game! I'm so happy to have been with Behavior from the get go, they have licensed some amazing killers and brought their own amazing content as well! If you like to be on the edge of your seat, this is the game for you! Hope to see you in the fog!

Not my favourite game but my mate wanted me to get it so I did. Kind of nice when the huntress follows me around and throws axes at me. Makes me feel wanted.
